title: Walking Time (min) to Nearest Buprenorphine Provider
name: BupAvTmWk
description: Average walking time (minutes) across tracts in county to nearest buprenorphine provider
source_long: U.S. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration Treatment Locator, 2019; Vivitrol, 2020; Open Source Routing Machine, 200
comments: All nearest distance calculations are in miles. All nearest travel time calculations are in minutes.
